snippet.title: Ghost Giant - E3 2018 Announcement Trailer | PS VR
snippet.description:
Ghost Giant is a heartfelt puzzle story in VR about trying to keep life together with a little help from a very big friend. Experience a new puzzle adventure from the studio behind Fe and Flipping Death when Ghost Giant releases exclusively on PlayStation®VR.

http://ghostgiant.zoinkgames.com

Music by Joel Bille

© Copyright - Zoink 2018
